title: Purchase Transaction Record Value
description: Schema for a transaction record containing receipt information, transaction date, and purchased items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction record.

receipt_id.description: Identifier associated with the transaction receipt.

transaction_date.description: Date and time of the transaction in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

items.description: List of items included in the transaction.

sku_id.description: SKU identifier for the purchased item.

unit_price.description: Price per unit of the item.

discounts.description: Total discounts applied to the item.
